29 de noviembre
6002
Elena, Mora, Yufei
The goal of this meeting is to find out which part of Jose's work on linguistic matching (specially the grammars, algorithms, architecture) can be used by Elena and Yufei. Their work is about matching lexico syntactic patterns included in design patterns and natural languages queries introduced by a user. The presentation will include: Elena will make a short presentation with the general idea and Yufei will present the study done up to now about the taggers. Jose will present his work (
.ppt file
).
